response.overview: 1 May and 15 May. birth and death. war and peace. bustle and calm. cruelty and mercy: a doorbell rang. I opened. I'm glad to see you. I have escaped. what I missed. but a door knocked, I opened it, what else could it be? I went out sometimes. I knocked on doors. opened, not opened. I was fired, I was hosted. a door and an opener. what else could it be? I opened the door I knocked myself today. The day you watch this movie, dear Hakan, I hope that you are opening this door. Come, come in, host yourself. Choose a place for yourself in this unstable, ambivalent world: cruelty and compassion. bustle and calm. war and peace. birth and death. 1 May and 15 May.  Happy 15th may world Hakan's day.
response.title: hakan and 1.5 may
